Employee Group Benefits

Tired of the same old process year to year?

  • Renewal.
  • Contribution and/or plan change to achieve reduction.
  • Bandaid another year.

    • Secure solutions LONG TERM with our proprietary programs!

  • Achieve valuable coverage with most cost effective approach.
  • We will present options you have yet to see!
  • Employers are SHOCKED with the savings results we are able to accomplish while keeping employees very satisfied with options.
  • Renewals with the national employer pool average 5/6% annually!

    • Employer Health Pool

    Take advantage of a nationwide employer health pool that has been saving employers substantial premium while keeping renewals at 5 to 6% annually. Nationwide network.

    Finally the health benefit solution employers and association have been looking for!

  • Groups of all size 20+ nationwide take advantage of the same plans and rates across all 50 states.
  • The Pool offers accommodations the traditional carriers do not offer that favor 1099 employees and the struggles of rate increases due to poor participation.
  • Great for associations, real estate companies and independent contractor entities.

    • Employer Owned On and Near Site Facilities

    One of our exclusive offerings is “ON OR NEAR SITE HEALTHCARE CLINICS”. We are happy to share reports that reflect ROI as much as 70% the first year. Employee ratings show the highest satisfaction. Self funded and fully insured employers save millions!!

    Facilities include:

  • Proactive wellness physician care
  • Holistic or traditional care
  • Private health coaches
  • Prescription dispensing
    • Webinars available please email us for more information. We have Associates Nationwide.

    Service List

    Group Benefits for Employers with at Least 20 Enrolled

    Medical/ Dental/ Vision/ EAP/ Disability/Accident/ Life/ Identity Theft/ Will Preparation/ Wellness/ On line enrollment/ ACA compliance tools and services/ Mortgage financing discounts

    Employer Health Pool

    An employer owned medicial facility. Personalized medical care for employees with proactive wellness approach, RX dispensing, personal coaching, and holistic care.

    Employer Owned On/ Near Site Facilities

    Employers with 1500 lives or more or those that want to band together with others, may participate in facilities that reduce claims by millions of dollars while providing medical care for the employees at a level most are not currently receiving.

    ACA Compliance Solutions

    There are many compliance mandates to be aware of. Our services include keeping you well informed and educated to avoid penalties and fees that could otherwise be very costly.

    Planning for Second Half of Life

    Secure your dignity and choices now with a plan that is tax deductible for business owners.

    Tax Free Retirement and 401K Rollovers

    There are very advanced planning strategies available today to achieve tax free retirement income. Let us show you how they may compliment your retirement planning.
